name: Verify GET request to retrieve single batch data with invalid batch ID

steps.name: Given  User creates request for Batch module with valid base URL and invalid batchId
When  User sends GET request with invalid batch ID from "batchesGet" and 0
Then  User receives "404" Not Found Status with message and boolean success details for invalid batchId
